title: CERBERUS2100: A Multi-CPU Open-Source Educational Microcomputer
description: Olimex recently featured the CERBERUS 2100 which is a multi-processor microcomputer that integrates classic computing architectures with modern design principles, offering a comprehensive educational platform for electronics and computer engineering students. The system features a trio of processors: the Z80 and W65C02S CPUs, known for their historical significance in computing, and an AVR I/O controller, […]
